title: 服务器开了玩家没法进来
author: yanqiyao
txt_content:
[12:41:17] [Server thread/INFO]: com.mojang.authlib.GameProfile@55386280[id=<null>,name=Fire_tianyu,properties={},legacy=false] (/101.88.178.70:54192) lost connection: Disconnected[控制台] 玩家退出: com.mojang.authlib.GameProfile@55386280[id=<null>,name=Fire_tianyu,properties={},legacy=false] (/101.88.178.70:54192)
   这个是后台报错，玩家进去后显示无效的会话！，，
服务器核心是官服1.8.3核心，有没有大神知道什么原因！！在线等
我是为了开盘灵古域qw,,,,

replies.author: h下划线h
replies.txt_content: 在你服务端那个文件夹的server.properities里面的online-mode=true改成online-mode=false就可以了（你进入服务器用的是盗版我的世界，把服务器设定改一下就好了）

replies.author: yanqiyao
replies.txt_content:
[12:24:33] [Server thread/INFO]: Starting minecraft server version 1.8.3
[12:24:33] [Server thread/INFO]: Loading properties
[12:24:33] [Server thread/INFO]: Default game type: ADVENTURE
[12:24:33] [Server thread/INFO]: Generating keypair
[12:24:33] [Server thread/INFO]: Starting Minecraft server on *:28015
[12:24:33] [Server thread/INFO]: Using default channel type
[12:24:34] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing level "world"
[12:24:34] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing start region for level 0
[12:24:35] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 76%
[12:24:35] [Server thread/INFO]: Done (1.209s)! For help, type "help" or "?"复制代码
这个是服务器启动时候的后台显示

replies.author: yanqiyao
replies.txt_content:
h下划线h 发表于 2018-10-14 12:55
在你服务端那个文件夹的server.properities里面的online-mode=true改成online-mode=false就可以了（你进入 ...
谢谢谢谢！！太感谢了，你是最佳答案

replies.author: yanqiyao
replies.txt_content:
tian_wc 发表于 2018-10-14 13:08
server.properities中修改online-mode=false
抱歉抱歉，前面有一个比你先回答了。不过还是谢谢你
